channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Scientists Think They’ve Found the Region of the Brain That Regulates Conscious Perception
item.description: A new experiment suggests that the thalamus plays a key role in humans becoming consciously aware of stimuli their brain receives.
